page.title: 11A typical non school day.
page.content:
Saturday
I would get up at 7am, get my tennis gear on, go downstairs for breakfast. i would have a grapefruit and three pieces of toast. I would watch TV till; at 9.30am Tony's dad takes us to play tennis. At 12.30 my Mum would pick us up from Southport and take up home. I would have lunch of crisps, hot dogs and a soft drink. After lunch I would go to Paul's house to see if he was playing. We would play tennis on his lawn till 4.30pm. When I get home I would have a shower and watch television. At 5.30pm I would have chips, salad and hamburgers for dinner. I would then watch TV till 8pm. I go to bed and read for an hour. At 9pm i would go to sleep.
